creditline: Gift of Juliann McGuire and Michael McGuire
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: predominantly dark red; four bands of thin multicolored stripes on each side-each band contains a thin central patterned band; white and dark red ikat bands at top and bottom; top band has diagonal lines; bottom band has X's and diamonds; warp faced plain weave with complementary warp and ikat patterning bands
title: Man's poncho
